the advertising is wrong i have not seen any russians asking me for avp or flaming me for no reasson there are some really stupid sounding people though so its fun to make fun of them. for example i play with this one guy named connor and he is so goddamn stupid its hilarious. this kid is on the brink of mental disability. i would love to say he is good at cs but he is just slow in the brain. thank god the matchmaking in this game is so dogshit that we get put against people that are nearly as stupid as him so it balances out. either way, good game
cncs并不怎样，但我没法不爱它，因为它就是我和我的同胞孕育出来的化身，它的出色与卑微，都映射出我的灵魂，cncs应该奋起，为了这么多饱经沧桑苦痛却依旧痴心不改的人们，我很骄傲我是他们的一员。所以，cncs哪怕是再多人的痰盂，也依然是我心中的圣杯。​
yes i would, but the cheating is getting out of control
